language.entry: MY BODY BECOMES INCORPOREAL, BUT MY RAGE REMAINS!
DESPITE MY INTANGIBLE STATE, I WILL DESTROY YOU!
MY SENSES RETURN AND WITH IT, MY RAGE!
I RETURN TO SIGHT, EAGER TO KILL!
ELDRITCH BLOOD COURSES THROUGH MY VEINS!
THE RUSH OF COMBAT. IT DRIVES ME TO ACTS OF TRAGEDY!
ONCE MORE, I LOSE MYSELF TO ANGER!
My anger is sated, for a time.
I see clearly, but not for long.
I AM A GOD AMONGST MEN. NONE CAN FACE ME!
THESE SCARS I BEAR, FAILED ATTEMPTS TO END MY LIFE!
I HAVE BEEN CURSED, MY RESILIENCE FADES!
NO! I FEEL PAIN ONCE MORE!
I am unseen. Perhaps a time to contemplate...
When none see me, I am calm...
They do not look my way, so I am at ease...
YOUR BLOWS DO NOT FAZE ME!
I BEAR THE SCARS OF COUNTLESS BATTLES! NOTHING CAN FELL ME!
I HAVE SURVIVED COUNTLESS FATAL BLOWS, ONE MORE WILL NOT FAZE ME!
OVERWHELMING RAGE MAKES ME NUMB TO PAIN!
BLOOD IN YOUR EYES, YOU WILL DIE BLIND!
I SHALL PULVERIZE YOU INTO PULP!
A DUST CLOUD FOLLOWS MY PATH OF DESTRUCTION!
KNEEL, AND PERHAPS I WILL GRANT YOU A SWIFT DEATH!
MY HATRED FOR THEM MANIFESTS AS INFECTION!
MY ELDRITCH BLOOD BURNS THEM TO THE TOUCH!
I AM THE HARBINGER OF DEATH, AND MY FOES FALL BEFORE ME!
ADRENALINE PUSHES ME BEYOND MY LIMITS!
I AM AN UNKILLABLE MOUNTAIN OF RAGE!
I AM A MAN THAT DOES NOT DIE!
I AM A SLAVE NO LONGER!
I AM FREED OF MY MENTAL SHACKLES!
I WILL NOT BE A SACRIFICE TO THIS MEANINGLESS CAUSE!
THE BODY ENDURES, BUT THE MIND SHATTERS!!!
I WILL CARVE A PATH OF DESTRUCTION!!!
NOTHING WILL REMAIN BUT BLOOD AND GORE!!!
IN THIS SAVAGE CARNAGE, ONLY I WILL REMAIN!!!
A TASTE OF TRUE FREEDOM! I MUST HAVE MORE!!!
I WILL BREAK THESE CHAINS AND FREE MY MIND!!!
I THIRST FOR BLOOD! THE CRUSHING OF BONES!!!
EACH LIFE I TAKE FUELS MY BLOODLUST!!!
I AM AN AVATAR OF DESTRUCTION!!!
I WILL RIP YOU ALL LIMB FROM LIMB!!!
I will take what I want, when I want.
If you deny me, I will not hesitate to end you.
The dirt will be your bed, I will sleep like a king.
You will listen to me. I am the leader of this expedition now.
You dislike my rule? Too bad.
I am the master, you are the slaves.
Perhaps an example must be made out of one of you.
You have valuable possessions. They are mine now.
I will crush you if you deny my orders.
OUT OF THE WAY, LEST YOU WANT TO BE TRAMPLED!
NOTHING WILL BLOCK ME FROM MY PREY!!!
I FEAR NOTHING, FOR MY WILL IS FREE!!!
WORTHLESS CATTLE! OUT OF MY WAY!
I AM BLINDED WITH PURE RAGE!!!
THE SCENT OF BLOOD! THE SIGHT OF GORE!!!
Move faster, sheep. I grow impatient.
At last, the slave becomes the master.
That's right, move along like the sheep you are!
The havoc I will cause, the destruction I will wreak!
I will leave my mark in this hell. A path of crushed bones and splattered corpses!
SHAPES BLUR TOGETHER! NONE ARE SAFE FROM ME!
YOU STAND IN MY WAY, SO YOU TOO SHALL FEEL MY WRATH!!!
I AM A WHIRLWIND OF VIOLENCE!!!
FRIEND AND FOE, ALL WILL DIE!!!
MUTILATION FOR ALL WHO APPROACH ME!!!
THIS IS MY FIGHT, NOT YOURS!
WHILE I BREATHE, NONE WILL RETREAT!
I WILL KILL ALL WHO FLEE!
YOU WILL TRIUMPH OR YOU WILL PERISH!
Even the strongest body cannot resist such corruption!
Survival at all costs! That is the only rule of life!
We are all slaves to the sands of time!
Come then, creature of creation! If I am to die, I will die free of my shackles!
The clanking of chains and trembling of the earth signal the arrival of this behemoth. Seeking to do the one thing it knows, to serve a master...
A family from a distant land come to repay a debt long forgotten with a most peculiar offering...
You see me as a slave, and chain me up as such...
Through your suffering, I will grow stronger.
Soon, you will bear the burdens I carry.
Do not fret, what I do to you will not kill you.
No injury is too much for me. I will endure.
You have no control over me. I will do as I please.

Born a slave and forced to fight for his master's pleasure, the Thrall is a monster amongst men. Any who futily assault this impenetrable beast will soon find themselves crushed to pulp as the Thrall unleashes a brutal counter-attack as punishment for defying him. However, should the Thrall feel his life is threatened, he will enter an uncontrollable rage. He will deny orders and do as he pleases as he destroys friend and foe alike.

The Thrall uses the weapons he is most familiar with, his twin cestuses. In brutal fashion, he crushes and maims any unfortunate enough to cross his path. The only armor the Thrall wears is the helmet that also serves as his collar. The rest of his body is left bare to display the countless scars inflicted by his opponents and his master.

The Thrall has spent much of his life in isolation when not in battle. As a result, he only knows how to care for himself. He will do things for his own benefit that could be detrimental to the entire party. Should his actions be too much, the party can elect to chain him up away from the camp, where he can harm no one.
MY BODY BECOMES INCORPOREAL, BUT MY RAGE REMAINS!
DESPITE MY INTANGIBLE STATE, I WILL DESTROY YOU!
MY SENSES RETURN AND WITH IT, MY RAGE!
I RETURN TO SIGHT, EAGER TO KILL!

THE RUSH OF COMBAT. IT DRIVES ME TO ACTS OF TRAGEDY!

My anger is sated, for a time.
I see clearly, but not for long.

Born a slave and forced to fight for his master's pleasure, the Thrall is a monster amongst men. Any who futily assault this impenetrable beast will soon find themselves crushed to pulp as the Thrall unleashes a brutal counter-attack as punishment for defying him. However, should the Thrall feel his life is threatened, he will enter an uncontrollable rage. He will deny orders and do as he pleases as he destroys friend and foe alike.

The Thrall uses the weapons he is most familiar with, his twin cestuses. In brutal fashion, he crushes and maims any unfortunate enough to cross his path. The only armor the Thrall wears is the helmet that also serves as his collar. The rest of his body is left bare to display the countless scars inflicted by his opponents and his master.

The Thrall has spent much of his life in isolation when not in battle. As a result, he only knows how to care for himself. NO! I FEEL PAIN ONCE MORE!

I BEAR THE SCARS OF COUNTLESS BATTLES! NOTHING CAN FELL ME!

BLOOD IN YOUR EYES, YOU WILL DIE BLIND!
I SHALL PULVERIZE YOU INTO PULP!
A DUST CLOUD FOLLOWS MY PATH OF DESTRUCTION!
KNEEL, AND PERHAPS I WILL GRANT YOU A SWIFT DEATH!
MY HATRED FOR THEM MANIFESTS AS INFECTION!
MY ELDRITCH BLOOD BURNS THEM TO THE TOUCH!
I AM THE HARBINGER OF DEATH, AND MY FOES FALL BEFORE ME!
ADRENALINE PUSHES ME BEYOND MY LIMITS!
I AM AN UNKILLABLE MOUNTAIN OF RAGE!
I AM A MAN THAT DOES NOT DIE!
ESTOU LIVRE DE MINHAS ARGOLAS MENTAIS!
NO SEREI UM SACRIFCIO PARA ESTA CAUSA SEM SENTIDO!
O CORPO SUPORTA, MAS A MENTE SE QUEBRA!!!
NO RESTARA NADA ALEM DE SANGUE E BRUTALIDADE!!!
NESTA CARNIFICINA SELVAGEM, SOMENTE EU PERMANECEREI!!!
UM GOSTO DE LIBERDADE VERDADEIRA! DEVO TER MAIS!!!
QUEBRAREI ESSAS CORRENTES E LIBERTAREI MINHA MENTE!!!
TENHO SEDE DE SANGUE E OSSOS QUEBRADOS!!!
CADA VIDA QUE TOMO ALIMENTA MEU DESEJO DE SANGUE!!!
OS MATAREI ARRANCANDO MEMBRO POR MEMBRO!!!
Pegarei o que quiser, quando quiser.
Se me negar, no hesitarei em acabar com voc.
O cho ser sua cama, dormirei como um rei.
Ir me ouvir. Sou o lder desta expedio agora.
No gosta da minha regra? Que pena.
Sou o mestre, vocs os escravos.
Talvez um exemplo seja feito de um de vocs.
Voc tem bens valiosos. So meus agora.
Irei esmaga-lo se negar minhas ordens.
SAIA DO CAMINHO, SE NO QUISER SER PISOTEADO!
NADA IR ME TIRAR DO CAMINHO DA PRESA!!!
NO TEMO NADA POIS SOU LIVRE!!!
SANGUE E GLRIA ESPERAM POR MIM!
GADO INUTIL! FORA DO MEU CAMINHO!
O RANCOR GUIA TODAS MINHAS AES!!!
O AROMA DO SANGUE! A MATANA!!!
Mova-se mais rpido, ovelha. Fico impaciente.
Por fim, o escravo se torna o mestre.
Isso mesmo, movam-se como ovelhas que so!
O estrago que causarei, a destruio que vou causar!
Deixarei minha marca neste inferno. Um caminho de ossos esmagados e cadveres salpicados!
AS SILHUETAS SE RETORCEM! NINGUM EST A SALVO DE MIM!
YOU VOC EST NO MEU CAMINHO, ENTO TAMBM SENTIR MINHA IRA!!!
MUTILAO A TODOS QUE SE APROXIMAREM DE MIM!!!
Mesmo o corpo mais forte no pode resistir a tal corrupo!
Sobrevivncia a todo custo! Essa a nica regra da vida!
Somos todos escravos das areias do tempo!
Venha, criatura da criao! Se eu morrer, morrerei livre das minhas argolas!
O barulho das correntes e o tremor da terra sinalizam a chegada deste gigante. Buscando fazer a nica coisa que conhece, para servir um mestre...
Uma famlia de uma terra distante veio pagar uma dvida esquecida com uma oferta mais peculiar...
Quando as Vacas Voltam Para Casa
Me v como um escravo e me acorrenta como tal...
Atravs do seu sofrimento, me fortalecerei.
Em breve, suportar os fardos que carrego.
No se preocupe, o que fao a voc no ir mata-lo.
Nenhum dano demais para mim. Eu aguento.
Voc no tem controle sobre mim. Farei o que eu quiser.

Nasceu escravo e forado a lutar pelo prazer de seu mestre, o Thrall um monstro entre os homens. Qualquer um que ataque esta besta impenetrvel logo acabar esmagado, pois o Thrall desencadeia um contra-ataque brutal como punio por t-lo desafiado. No entanto, se o Thrall sentir que sua vida est ameaada, entrar em uma raiva incontrolvel. Negar as ordens e far o que quiser, j que ele destri amigos e inimigos.

O Thrall usa as armas com as quais ele est mais familiarizado, suas manoplas gmeas. De forma brutal, esmaga e mutila qualquer infeliz que cruze o seu caminho. A nica armadura que o Thrall usa o elmo que tambm serve como coleira. O resto de seu corpo deixado amostra para exibir as inmeras cicatrizes infligidas por seus oponentes e seu mestre.

O Thrall passou a maior parte da sua vida isolado quando no estava em batalha. Como resultado, s sabe cuidar de si mesmo. Far coisas para seu prprio benefcio que poderia prejudicar todos do grupo. Se suas aes forem demais, o grupo pode optar por acorrenta-lo longe do acampamento, onde ele no pode prejudicar ningum.
MY BODY BECOMES INCORPOREAL, BUT MY RAGE REMAINS!
DESPITE MY INTANGIBLE STATE, I WILL DESTROY YOU!
MY SENSES RETURN AND WITH IT, MY RAGE!
I RETURN TO SIGHT, EAGER TO KILL!
ELDRITCH BLOOD COURSES THROUGH MY VEINS!
THE RUSH OF COMBAT. IT DRIVES ME TO ACTS OF TRAGEDY!
ONCE MORE, I LOSE MYSELF TO ANGER!
My anger is sated, for a time.
I see clearly, but not for long.

They do not look my way, so I am at ease...

BLOOD IN YOUR EYES, YOU WILL DIE BLIND!
I SHALL PULVERIZE YOU INTO PULP!
A DUST CLOUD FOLLOWS MY PATH OF DESTRUCTION!
KNEEL, AND PERHAPS I WILL GRANT YOU A SWIFT DEATH!
MY HATRED FOR THEM MANIFESTS AS INFECTION!
MY ELDRITCH BLOOD BURNS THEM TO THE TOUCH!
I AM THE HARBINGER OF DEATH, AND MY FOES FALL BEFORE ME!
ADRENALINE PUSHES ME BEYOND MY LIMITS!
I AM AN UNKILLABLE MOUNTAIN OF RAGE!
I AM A MAN THAT DOES NOT DIE!
TLO ODOLV, ALE MYSL SE TT!!!
NIC NEZBYDE, JEN KREV A MASO!!!
V TOMTO DIVOKM MASAKRU, JEN J ZSTANU!!!
CHUT SKUTEN SVOBODY! MUSM MT VC!!!
ROZBIJU TYTO OKOVY A OSVOBODM SVOU MYSL!!!
ZNM PO KRVI! PO PRASKN KOST!!!
KAD IVOT, KTER VEZMU, ZESILUJE MOU KRVELANOST!!!
Vezmu si, co budu chtt, kdy budu chtt.
Pokud m neposlechnete, nebudu vhat vs ukonit.
Ve pn spte vy, j budu spt jako krl.
Budete m poslouchat. Te jsem vdce vpravy j.
Nelb se vm m vlda? Velmi patn.
J jsem pn, vy jste otroci.
Zejm je teba z vs udlat pklad.
NIC NEBUDE STT MEZI MNOU A MOU KOIST!!!
NEBOJM SE NIEHO, M VLE JE VOLN!!!
Pesn, pokraujte jako ovce, kter jste!
V tomhle pekle se podepu. Cestou z rozdrcench kost pockanou krv!
OBRYSY SE SLVAJ! NIKDO SE PEDE MNOU NEZACHRN!
STOJ MI V CEST, I TY POCT MJ HNV!!!
ROZTRHM KADHO, KDO SE MI POSTAV!!!
TOHLE JE MJ BOJ, NE TVJ!
BOJUJEME NA IVOT A NA SMRT!
Ani nejsilnj tlo neodol takov zkaenosti!
Pet za kadou cenu! Jedin pravidlo ivota!
Pro psky asu jsme vichni otroci!
Tak poj, bytosti stvoen! Pokud mm zemt, zemu bez okov!
inen etz a tesouc se zem oznamuj pchod monstra. Tou dlat to, co um, slouit svmu pnu.
Rodina z dalek zem pichz splatit dlouho zapomenut dluh prapodivnm darem...
Vidte ve m otroka a spoutvte m jako otroka...
Brzy ponese bemeno, kter nesu j.
dn zrann m nezastav. J vytrvm.
Nemete m ovldat. Udlm, co budu chtt.

Narozen v otroctv a nucen bojovat pro potchu svho pna, Thrall je stvrou mezi lidmi. Kdokoli neuvliv napadne toto nepemoiteln zve, je brzy rozdrcen na kai brutlnm protitokem - trestem za odpor. Nicmn, pokud se Thrall ct ohroen na ivot, dostane neovladateln vztek. Bude odmtat rozkazy a dle vlastn vle hubit neptele i ptele bez rozdlu.

Thrall uv zbran, kter zn nejlpe, dvojici bitevnch rukavic. Brutlnm zpsobem drt a mrza kohokoli, kdo mu neastn sk cestu. Jedin zbroj, kterou Thrall nos, je jeho plba, kter zrove slou jako nkrnk. Zbytek tla je ponechn hol, aby ukzal bezpoet jizev od jeho protivnk a jeho pna.

Thrall strvil krom boje vtinu ivota v izolaci. Z toho plyne, e se um starat pouze sm o sebe. Bude dlat vci ve svm vlastnm zjmu, kter mohou bt kodliv pro celou partu. Pokud toho bude pli, parta se me dohodnout ho svzat mimo kemp, kde nikomu neubl.

MY ELDRITCH BLOOD BURNS THEM TO THE TOUCH!
I AM THE HARBINGER OF DEATH, AND MY FOES FALL BEFORE ME!
ADRENALINE PUSHES ME BEYOND MY LIMITS!
I AM AN UNKILLABLE MOUNTAIN OF RAGE!
I AM A MAN THAT DOES NOT DIE!
JE NE SUIS PLUS UN ESCLAVE!
ENFIN LIBR DES CHANES DE MON ESPRIT!
JE NE ME SACRIFIERAIS PAS POUR CETTE CAUSE INSENSE!
JE SUIS SUBMERG PAR LA RAGE!
LE CORPS ENDURE, MAIS L'ESPRIT SE BRISE!!!
JE SCULPTERAI UN CHEMIN DE DESTRUCTION!!!
IL NE RESTERA QUE DU SANG ET DES TRIPES!!!
JE SERAIS LE SEUL SURVIVANT DE CE CARNAGE!!!
LE GOT DE LA VRAI LIBERT! IL M'EN FAUT PLUS!!!
JE DTRUIRAIS CES CHANES ET LIBRERAIT MON ESPRIT!!!
J'AI SOIF DE SANG! J'CRASERAIS VOS OS!!!
CHAQUE VICTIME NE FAIT QUE NOURRIR MA FURIE SANGUINAIRE!!!
JE SUIS L'AVATAR DE LA DESTRUCTION!!!
JE VAIS VOUS TRIPER UN PAR UN!!!
Je prendrais ce que je veux, quand je le veux.
Si vous refusez, je n'hsiterais pas vous tuer.
La terre vous servira de lit, je dormirais comme un roi.
Vous allez m'couter. C'est moi qui dirige cette expdition maintenant.
Tu n'aimes pas mes rgles? Tant pis pour toi.
Je suis le matre, vous tes les esclaves.
Il faut peut-tre faire de toi un exemple.
Tu as des biens de valeurs. Ils m'appartiennent dsormais.
Je t'craserais si tu n'obis pas mes ordres.
FAITE MOI DE LA PLACE, SAUF SI VOUS VOULEZ QUE JE VOUS PITINE!
RIEN NE SE METTRA ENTRE MOI ET MA PROIE!!!
JE NE CRAINS RIEN, CAR MA VOLONT EST LIBRE!!!
LE SANG ET LA GLOIRE M'ATTENDENT!
TU ME FAIS PERDRE DU TEMPS! BOUGE!
MISRABLE SAC DE VIANDE! HORS DE MON CHEMIN!
JE FAIS CE QU'IL ME PLAT!!!
JE SUIS AVEUGL PAR DE LA RAGE PURE!!!
L'ODEUR DU SANG! LA VUE DES TRIPES!!!
Va plus vite, mouton. Je deviens impatient.
C'est a, avancez ensembles commes les moutons que vous tes!
Je provoquerai le chaos, j'apporterais la destruction!
Je laisserai une marque dans cet enfer. Un chemin d'os briss et de corps sans vie!
Le sang et la gloire nous attendent!
LES FORMES DISPARAISSENT! AUCUN N'EST L'ABRI DE MOI!
TU ES SUR MON CHEMIN, TU CONNATRA GALEMENT MA COLRE!!!
JE SUIS UNE TEMPTE DE VIOLENCE!!!
MUTILATION POUR TOUS CEUX QUI M'APPROCHENT!!!
C'EST MON COMBAT, PAS LE TIENS!
LA BATAILLE N'EST PAS ENCORE FINIE!
TANT QUE JE RESPIRE, AUCUN NE BATTRA EN RETRAITE!
JE TUERAIS TOUS LES LCHES QUI FUIENT!
VOUS NE POUVEZ PAS M'ENCHANER ICI!
Mme les corps les plus puissants ne peuvent rsister un telle corruption!
La survie, peu importe le cot ! C'est la seule rgle de cette vie!
Nous sommes tous les esclaves du sable du temps!
Alors viens, crature de cration! Si je dois mourir, je mourrai libr de mes chanes!
Les cliquetis des chanes et les tremblements de la terre indiquent l'arrive de ce bhmoth. Cherchant faire la chose qu'elle sait faire, servir un matre...
Une famille d'une contre lointaine viens payer une dette depuis longtemps oublie avec une offre... particulire...
NUL N'EST PLUS FORT QUE MOI!
Vous me voyez comme un esclave, et vous m'enchanez comme tel...
Par ta souffrance, je deviendrais plus fort.
Bientt, tu portera les mmes fardeaux que moi.
Ne crains pas, ce que je te fais ne vas pas te tuer.
Aucune blessure n'est trop pour moi. J'endurerais.
Vous n'avez aucun contrle sur moi. Je fais ce qu'il me plat.

N esclave et forc combattre pour le plaisir de ses matres, le Serviteur est un monstre parmi hommes. Quiconque attaque futilement cette impntrable bte se retrouvera rapidement transform en bouillie lorsque le Serviteur dchane une brutale contre-attaque comme punition pour l'avoir dfi. Cependant, si le Serviteur sent que sa vie est en danger, il entre dans une rage incontrlable. Il refusera les ordres et n'en fera qu' sa tte en brisant amis et ennemis.

Le Serviteur se sert des armes qui lui sont le plus familires, ses deux cestes. De manire brutale, il crase et mutile tous les malheureux qui croisent son chemin. La seule armure que porte le Serviteur est un casque qui lui sert galement de collier de servitude. Le reste de son corps est laiss nu pour montrer les innombrables blessures que lui ont infligs ses adversaires et ses matres.

Le Serviteur a pass beaucoup de temps isol lorsqu'il ne combattait pas. De ce fait, il ne sait que prendre soin de lui mme. Il fera des choses pour son bnfice qui seront nfaste au reste du groupe. Si ses actions en sont trop, le groupe peut dcider de l'enchaner plus loin du camp, l ou il ne blessera personne.
MY BODY BECOMES INCORPOREAL, BUT MY RAGE REMAINS!
DESPITE MY INTANGIBLE STATE, I WILL DESTROY YOU!
MY SENSES RETURN AND WITH IT, MY RAGE!
I RETURN TO SIGHT, EAGER TO KILL!
ELDRITCH BLOOD COURSES THROUGH MY VEINS!
THE RUSH OF COMBAT. IT DRIVES ME TO ACTS OF TRAGEDY!
ONCE MORE, I LOSE MYSELF TO ANGER!
My anger is sated, for a time.
I see clearly, but not for long.
I AM A GOD AMONGST MEN. NONE CAN FACE ME!
THESE SCARS I BEAR, FAILED ATTEMPTS TO END MY LIFE!
I HAVE BEEN CURSED, MY RESILIENCE FADES!
NO! I FEEL PAIN ONCE MORE!
I am unseen. Perhaps a time to contemplate...
When none see me, I am calm...
They do not look my way, so I am at ease...
YOUR BLOWS DO NOT FAZE ME!
I BEAR THE SCARS OF COUNTLESS BATTLES! NOTHING CAN FELL ME!
I HAVE SURVIVED COUNTLESS FATAL BLOWS, ONE MORE WILL NOT FAZE ME!
OVERWHELMING RAGE MAKES ME NUMB TO PAIN!
BLOOD IN YOUR EYES, YOU WILL DIE BLIND!
I SHALL PULVERIZE YOU INTO PULP!
A DUST CLOUD FOLLOWS MY PATH OF DESTRUCTION!
KNEEL, AND PERHAPS I WILL GRANT YOU A SWIFT DEATH!
MY HATRED FOR THEM MANIFESTS AS INFECTION!
MY ELDRITCH BLOOD BURNS THEM TO THE TOUCH!
I AM THE HARBINGER OF DEATH, AND MY FOES FALL BEFORE ME!
ADRENALINE PUSHES ME BEYOND MY LIMITS!
I AM AN UNKILLABLE MOUNTAIN OF RAGE!
I AM A MAN THAT DOES NOT DIE!
ICH BIN FREI VON MEINEN KETTEN!
ICH WERDE KEIN OPFER FR DIESE SINNLOSE SACHE!
DER KRPER HLT STAND, DOCH DER GEIST ZERBRICHT!!!
ICH EBNE EINEN PFAD DER ZERSTRUNG!!!
NICHTS WIRD BLEIBEN AUER BLUT UND GEDRM!!!
IN DIESEM WILDEN MASSAKER WERDE ICH DER EINZIGE SEIN DER BLEIBT!!!
EIN VORGESCHMACK AUF WAHRE FREIHEIT! ICH WILL MEHR!!!
ICH ZERTRMMERE DIESE KETTEN UND BEFREIE MEINEN GEIST!!!
MIR DRSTET ES NACH BLUT! DEM ZERSCHMETTERN VON KNOCHEN!!!
JEDES LEBEN DAS ICH NEHME VERSTRKT MEINEN BLUTRAUSCH!!!
ICH BIN DAS ABBILD DER ZERSTRUNG!!!
ICH REI DIR ALLE GLIEDMAEN EINZELN HERAUS!!!
Ich nehme mir was ich will, wann immer ich es will.
Sag nein und ich werde nicht zgern dich zu tten.
Der Dreck wird dein Bett sein, ich werde wie ein Knig schlafen.
Du wirst mir gehorchen. Ich bin jetzt der Anfhrer dieser Expedition.
Dir missfallen meine Regeln? Ein Jammer.
Ich bin der Meister, ihr seid die Sklaven.
Vielleicht muss ich an einem von euch ein Exempel statuieren.
Ihr habt einige wertvolle Sachen bei euch. Sie gehren jetzt mir.
Ich zermalme euch wenn ihr euch meinem Befehl widersetzt.
AUS DEM WEG ODER ICH ZERTRAMPEL EUCH!
NICHTS STELLT SICH ZWISCHEN MIR UND MEINER BEUTE!!!
ICH FRCHTE NICHTS, MEIN WILLE IST FREI!!!
DU VERSCHWENDEST MEINE ZEIT! BEWEG DICH!
DER GERUCH VON BLUT! DER ANBLICK VON GEDRMEN!!!
Beweg dich du Schaf. Ich werde ungeduldig.
Endlich wird aus dem Sklaven ein Meister.
So ist es recht, geht bei Seite wie die kleinen Lmmer die ihr seid!
The havoc I will cause, the destruction I will wreak!
Das Chaos das ich veranstalten, die Zerstrung die ich anrichten werde!
DIE SCHATTEN VERMISCHEN SICH! NIEMAND IST VOR MIR SICHER!
DU STEHST MIR IM WEG ALSO SPRE MEINEN ZORN!!!
ICH BIN EIN WIRBELWIND DER GEWALT!!!
FREUND ODER FEIND, ALLE WERDEN STERBEN!!!
ICH REI DIR DEINE GLIEDMAEN RAUS!!!
ICH VERSTMMEL JEDEN DER MIR ZU NAHE KOMMT!!!
DAS IST MEIN KAMPF, NICHT DEINER!
DIE SCHLACHT IST NOCH NICHT VORBEI!
SOLANGE ICH NOCH ATME WIRD KEINER SICH ZURCKZIEHEN!
ICH TTE JEDEN DER VERSUCHT ZU FLIEHEN!
IHR KNNT MICH HIER NICHT FESTKETTEN!
Nicht einmal der strkste Krper kann einer solchen Verderbtheit widerstehen!
berleben um jeden Preis! Das ist das einzige Lebensmotto!
Wir sind alle Sklaven fr den Sand der Zeit!
Dann komm schon her, Kreatur der Kreation! Wenn ich schon sterben muss, werde ich das frei von meinen Ketten tun!
Das rasseln der Ketten und beben der Erde verkndet das Eintreffen dieses Kolosses. Er kommt mit dem Ziel das einzige zu tun das er kann. Einem Meister zu dienen...
Eine Familie aus einem fernen Land kommt um eine lngst vergessene Schuld zu begleichen. Mit einem uerst merkwrdigen Angebot...
Wenn die Khe nach Hause kommen
Ihr seht mich als einen Sklaven und legt mir wie einem Ketten an...
Durch dein Leiden, werde ich strker.
Bald schon wirst du die Laster tragen die mir auferliegen.
Keine Angst, was ich mit dir vorhabe wird dich nicht umbringen.
Keine Verletzung ist zuviel fr mich. Ich werde standhalten.
Ihr habt keine Kontrolle ber mich. Ich werde tun was ich will.

Geboren als Leibeigener und gezwungen zur Belustigung seiner Meister zu kmpfen. Der Sklave ist ein Monster unter den Menschen. Jeder der vergeblich versucht dieses unbezwingbare Ungetm anzugreifen findet, sich durch eine Konterattacke sehr schnell in Grund und Boden gestampft wieder. Sollte der Sklave allerdings das Gefhl bekommen, dass sein Leben in Gefahr ist, bricht er in unkontrollierbare Raserei aus. Er wird Befehle verweigern und tun was er fr richtig hlt whrend er jeden um sich herum ttet ob Freund oder Feind.

Der Sklave benutzt die Waffen mit denen er am besten Vertraut ist. Seine beiden Cestuse. Auf brutalste Art und Weise, zertrmmert und verstmmelt er jeden der es wagt sich ihm in den Weg zu stellen. Die einzige Rstung die der Sklave trgt ist sein Helm der ihm gleichzeitig als Sklavenhalsband dient. Der Rest des Krpers steht frei und bringt unzhlige Narben zum Vorschein die durch seine Widersacher und Meister verursacht wurden.

Der Sklave verbrachte die grte Zeit seines Lebens in Isolation, wenn er nicht am kmpfen war. Dementsprechend weiss er auch nur wie man sich um sich selbst kmmert. Er wird Sachen zu seinem eigenen Wohl machen die von Nachteil fr den Rest der Gruppe sein knnten. Sollte er jedoch einmal zu weit gehen, kann die Gruppe dazu abstimmen ihn fernab des Lagers in Ketten zu legen wo er niemandem schaden kann.
MY BODY BECOMES INCORPOREAL, BUT MY RAGE REMAINS!
DESPITE MY INTANGIBLE STATE, I WILL DESTROY YOU!
MY SENSES RETURN AND WITH IT, MY RAGE!
I RETURN TO SIGHT, EAGER TO KILL!
ELDRITCH BLOOD COURSES THROUGH MY VEINS!
THE RUSH OF COMBAT. IT DRIVES ME TO ACTS OF TRAGEDY!
ONCE MORE, I LOSE MYSELF TO ANGER!
My anger is sated, for a time.
I see clearly, but not for long.
I AM A GOD AMONGST MEN. NONE CAN FACE ME!
THESE SCARS I BEAR, FAILED ATTEMPTS TO END MY LIFE!
I HAVE BEEN CURSED, MY RESILIENCE FADES!
NO! I FEEL PAIN ONCE MORE!
I am unseen. Perhaps a time to contemplate...
When none see me, I am calm...
They do not look my way, so I am at ease...
YOUR BLOWS DO NOT FAZE ME!
I BEAR THE SCARS OF COUNTLESS BATTLES! NOTHING CAN FELL ME!
I HAVE SURVIVED COUNTLESS FATAL BLOWS, ONE MORE WILL NOT FAZE ME!
OVERWHELMING RAGE MAKES ME NUMB TO PAIN!
BLOOD IN YOUR EYES, YOU WILL DIE BLIND!
I SHALL PULVERIZE YOU INTO PULP!
A DUST CLOUD FOLLOWS MY PATH OF DESTRUCTION!
KNEEL, AND PERHAPS I WILL GRANT YOU A SWIFT DEATH!
MY HATRED FOR THEM MANIFESTS AS INFECTION!
MY ELDRITCH BLOOD BURNS THEM TO THE TOUCH!
I AM THE HARBINGER OF DEATH, AND MY FOES FALL BEFORE ME!
ADRENALINE PUSHES ME BEYOND MY LIMITS!
I AM AN UNKILLABLE MOUNTAIN OF RAGE!
I AM A MAN THAT DOES NOT DIE!
SONO LIBERO DA QUESTE COSTRIZIONI MENTALI ORA!
NON SAR UN SACRIFICIO PER QUESTA CAUSA INSENSATA!
IL CORPO SOPPORTA, MA LA MENTE SI SPEZZA!!!
NON RIMARRA ALTRO CHE UNA POLTIGLIA SANGUINOLENTA!!!
IN QUESTO MASSACRO SELVAGGIO, SOLO IO RESTER!!!
IL SAPORE DELLA VERA LIBERTA! NE VOGLIO ANCORA!!!
SPEZZER QUESTE CATENE E LIBERER LA MIA MENTE!!!
HO SETE DI SANGUE! RUMORE DI OSSA SPEZZATE!!!
OGNI VITA CHE PRENDO ALIMENTA LA MIA FURIA!!!
TI RIDUCO A BRANDELLI PEZZO PER PEZZO!!!
Prendo ci che voglio, quando voglio.
Prova a metterti contro di me, e non ci penser due volte a trucidarti.
Dormirai come un cane, ed io come un re.
Tu rispondi a me. Sono io il capo di questa spedizione ora.
Io sono il comandante, e voi gli schiavi.
Forse devo mostrare agli altri cosa succede a quelli come te.
Quante cose preziose che hai. Sono mie adesso.
Prova a darmi torto e ti spezzo in due.
LEVATI DI MEZZO, SE NON VUOI ESSERE CALPESTATO!
NULLA SI METTE TRA ME E LA MIA PREDA!!!
NON HO PAURA DI NULLA, IO SONO LIBERO!!!
L'ODORE DEL SANGUE! LA VISTA DEL MACELLO!!!
Pi veloce, capra. Mi fai spazientire.
Bravi, spostatevi come le bestie che siete!
Che devastazione e caos che sto per creare!
Lascer il mio marchio in questo inferno. Una strada di ossa spezzate e corpi dilaniati!
LE SAGOME SI CONFONDONO! NESSUNO AL SICURO DA ME!
METTITI IN MEZZO E FARAI UNA BRUTTA FINE!!!
PROVATE AD AVVICINARVI E VI FACCIO A BRANDELLI!!!
LA MIA BATTAGLIA, NON LA TUA!
UCCIDER TUTTI QUELLI CHE OSANO SCAPPARE!
NON MI PUOI TENERE INCATENATO QUI!
LA MIA E SOLO MIA VOLONTA!
Anche il corpo pi forte non resiste a tale corruzione!
Sopravvivere sopra a tutto! l'unica cosa che importa!
Siamo tutti schiavi alle sabbie del tempo!
Forza allora, creatura immonda! Se devo morire, morir libero la quese catene!
Il tintinnio delle catene e i tremori della terra annunciano l'arrivo di questo mastodonte. Cercando l'unica cosa che sa fare, servire un padrone...
Una famiglia da un isola lontana venuta per saldare un debito quasi dimenticato, con un'offerta alquanto bizzarra...
Mi vedi come schiavo, e mi incateni come tale...
Grazie al tuo sacrificio, diventer pi forte.
Presto, porterai il peso che porto io.
Non agitarti, quello che ti sto per fare non ti uccider.
Nessuna ferita troppo per me. Resister.
Non riesco a controllare me stesso. Faccio ci che voglio.

Nato come schiavo e costretto a combattere per lo svago del suo padrone, lo Schiavo un mostro tra gli uomini. Tutti coloro che attaccano questa bestia di uomo si ritrovano fatti a pezzi dal suo brutale contrattacco come per punire chi gli si para innanzi. Se comunque, lo Schiavo dovesse sentire la propria vita in pericolo, cadr in un'ira incontrollabile. Inizier a disobbedire agli ordini e far ci che vuole attaccando in modo incontrollato nemici ed alleati.

Lo Schiavo usa le armi a lui pi familiari, il suoi caestus gemelli. In modo brutale, spezza e mutila chiunque abbia la sfortuna di trovarsi sulla sua strada. L'unica armatura da lui indossata un elmo che serve anche da guinzaglio. Il resto del suo corpo scoperto mostra le miriadi di cicatrici lasciate dai suoi nemici e dal suo padrone.

Lo Schiavo ha speso la maggior parte della sua vita in isolazione quando non in battaglia. Di conseguenza, lui si sa prendere cura solo di se stesso.Far cose a suo beneficio non preoccupandosi che siano a svantaggio della squadra. Per limitare il suo comportamento selvaggio, la squadra pu decidere di confinarlo lontano dall'accampamento, dove non pu recare alcun danno.

ADRENALINE PUSHES ME BEYOND MY LIMITS!
I AM AN UNKILLABLE MOUNTAIN OF RAGE!
I AM A MAN THAT DOES NOT DIE!
NIE ZOSTAN POWICONY DLA NIE WARTEJ SPRAWY!
CIAO PRZETRWA, ALE UMYS ZOSTANIE ROZTRZASKANY!!!
NIC NIE ZOSTANIE OPRCZ KRWI I FLAKW!!!
W TEJ BRUTALNEJ RZEZI TYLKO JA PRZETRWAM!!!
ZNISZCZ TE WIZY I UWOLNI SWJ UMYS!!!
KADE YCIE KTRE ODBIERAM KARMI MOJ DZ KRWI!!!
Wezm co chce i kiedy chc.
Jeeli mi odmwisz, nie bd si powstrzymywa by ci zabi.
Ziemia bdzie twoim kiem, Ja bd spa jak krl.
Bdziecie si mnie sucha. Od teraz ja jestem liderem tej ekspedycji.
Nie lubisz moich zasad? Zle dla ciebie.
Jestem waszym Panem, wy jestecie sugami.
Przykad musi by wykonany na jednym z was.
Masz cenne rzeczy. Od teraz s moje.
Zmiad was jeeli bdziecie mi nieposuszni.
Z DROGI, CHYBA E CHCECIE BY ZDEPTANI!
NIKT NIE PRZESZKADZA MI W MOJEJ MODLITWIE!!!
NICZEGO SI NIE BOJ, MJ UMYS JEST WOLNY!!!
KREW I CHWAA CZEKAJ NA MNIE!
Zgadza si, poruszaj si jak baran, ktrym jeste!
Zostawi swoje pitno w tym piekle. cieka zmiadonych koci i roztrzaskanych zwok!
Krew i chwaa czekaj na nas!
KSZTATY MI SI ZAMAZUJ! NIKT NIE JEST BEZPIECZNY!
STOISZ NA MOJEJ DRODZE, WIC POCZUJESZ MOJ WCIEKO!!!
Nawet najsilniejsze ciao nie przetrwa takiego zepsucia!
Przey za wszelk cen! To moja jedyna zasada!
Chod wic, kreaturo! Jeeli zgin, to zgin wolny od kajdan!
Brzdk acuchw i wstrznicia ziemi sygnalizuj przybycie potwora. Szukajc tego co tylko umie robi, suy mistrzowi...
Rodzina z dalekich krain przybywa aby spaci dawno zapomniany dug w bardzo osobliwej ofercie...
NIKT NIE JEST SILNIEJSZY NI JA!
Widzisz mnie jako niewolnika i zakuwasz mnie acuchami jakbym nim by...
Dziki twojemu cierpieniu, rosn w si.
Nie denerwuj si, to co ci zrobi, nie zabije ci.
adna rana nie jest dla mnie za dua. Wytrzymam.
Nie masz nade mn kontroli. Zrobi co bd chcia.

Urodzony jako niewolnik i zmuszony do walki dla przyjemnoci jego Pana. Thrall jest potworem wrd ludzi. Kady, kto bezskutecznie sprbuje zaatakowa t besti zostanie zmiadony na miazg od razu jak Thrall uwolni swj brutalny kontratak jako kar za przeciwstawienie si mu. Jednake, jeeli Thrall poczuje, e jego ycie jest zagroone, wejdzie w niekontrolowany gniew. Odmwi wykonywania rozkazw i zrobi to co bdzie mu si podobao, zniszczy przeciwnika, lecz przed jego furi nie uciekn te przyjaciele.

Thrall uywa broni, z ktr jest najlepiej obeznany, czyli swoich dwch cestusw. Z brutaln pasj miady kadego pechowca, ktry wejdzie mu w drog. Jedyn zbroj, ktr uywa jest jego hem. Reszta jego ciaa jest nieosonita, aby ukaza jego niezliczone blizny, ktre powstay w wyniku wielu walk oraz od kar jego pana.

Thrall spdzi du cz jego ycia w izolacji kiedy akurat nie uczestniczy w walce. W wyniku czego, wie tylko jak zadba o siebie. Bdzie robi rzeczy dla wasnej korzyci, ktre mog by szkodliwe dla caej druyny. Jeli jego dziaania bd przekraczay limity, druyna moe go odizolowa od obozu, gdzie nie bdzie mg nikogo skrzywdzi.

I see clearly, but not for long.
I AM A GOD AMONGST MEN. NONE CAN FACE ME!
THESE SCARS I BEAR, FAILED ATTEMPTS TO END MY LIFE!
I HAVE BEEN CURSED, MY RESILIENCE FADES!
NO! I FEEL PAIN ONCE MORE!
I am unseen. Perhaps a time to contemplate...
When none see me, I am calm...
They do not look my way, so I am at ease...
YOUR BLOWS DO NOT FAZE ME!
I BEAR THE SCARS OF COUNTLESS BATTLES! NOTHING CAN FELL ME!
I HAVE SURVIVED COUNTLESS FATAL BLOWS, ONE MORE WILL NOT FAZE ME!
OVERWHELMING RAGE MAKES ME NUMB TO PAIN!
BLOOD IN YOUR EYES, YOU WILL DIE BLIND!
I SHALL PULVERIZE YOU INTO PULP!
A DUST CLOUD FOLLOWS MY PATH OF DESTRUCTION!
KNEEL, AND PERHAPS I WILL GRANT YOU A SWIFT DEATH!
MY HATRED FOR THEM MANIFESTS AS INFECTION!
MY ELDRITCH BLOOD BURNS THEM TO THE TOUCH!
I AM THE HARBINGER OF DEATH, AND MY FOES FALL BEFORE ME!
ADRENALINE PUSHES ME BEYOND MY LIMITS!
I AM AN UNKILLABLE MOUNTAIN OF RAGE!
I AM A MAN THAT DOES NOT DIE!
ESTOY LIBRE DE LOS GRILLETES DE MI MENTE!
NO ME SACRIFICAR POR ESTA CAUSA SIN PROPSITO!
MI CUERPO RESISTE, PERO MI MENTE SE HACE AICOS!!!
YO FORJAR EL CAMINO A LA DESTRUCCIN!!!
NO QUEDAR NADA MS QUE SANGRE Y BRUTALIDAD!!!
SLO YO SALDR VIVO DE ESTA MATANZA SALVAJE!!!
ROMPER ESTAS CADENAS Y LIBERAR MI MENTE!!!
TENGO SED DE SANGRE Y HUESOS ROTOS!!!
CADA VIDA QUE ARREBATO ALIMENTA MI DESEO DE SANGRE!!!
SOY EL PREGN DE LA DESTRUCCIN!!!
OS ARRANCAR LAS EXTREMIDADES UNA A UNA!!!
Tendr lo que quiera y cuando quiera.
Si me niegas lo que quiero, no dudar en acabar contigo.
Yaceris en la tierra y dormir como un rey sobre vosotros.
Hars lo que yo diga. Soy el lder de la expedicin ahora.
No te gusta mi orden? Que lstima.
Yo soy el maestro y vosotros los esclavos.
No deberais ser el ejemplo de nadie.
Veo que tienes objetos valiosos. Ahora son mos.
Os aplastar si no aceptis mis rdenes.
QUITAD DE MI CAMINO SI NO QUERIS QUE OS APLASTE!
NADA ME APARTAR DEL CAMINO A MI PRESA!!!
NO LE TEMO A NADA PORQUE SOY UN HOMBRE LIBRE!!!
CHATE A UN LADO, BUFN SIN GRACIA!
LA SANGRE Y LA GLORIA ME AGUARDAN!
ME HACES PERDER EL TIEMPO! MUVETE!
GANADO INTIL! FUERA DE MI CAMINO!
EL RESENTIMIENTO ES EL MOTOR DE MIS ACCIONES!!!
EL AROMA DE LA SANGRE, LA MATANZA!!!
Muvete ms rpido, borrego. Me impaciento.
Al final el esclavo se ha convertido en amo.
Eso es, muvete como el borrego que eres!
Causar el caos, provocar la destruccin!
Dejar mi huella en este infierno. Un rastro de huesos rotos y salpicado de cadveres!
La sangre y la gloria nos aguardan!
LAS SILUETAS SE RETUERCEN! NADA EST A SALVO DE M!
ESTS EN MI CAMINO!!! SIENTE MI IRA!!!
AMIGO Y ENEMIGO, TODO DEBE MORIR!!!
LA MUTILACIN LE AGUARDA AL QUE SE ACERQUE A M!!!
ESTA ES MI LUCHA, NO LA TUYA!
MIENTRAS YO VIVA, NADIE SE RETIRAR!
MATAR A TODO AQUEL QUE HUYA!
EL TRIUNFO O LA RUINA NADA MS!
Ni siquiera el cuerpo ms resistente puede luchar contra esa corrupcin!
Supervivencia ante todo! Esa es la nica regla en esta vida!
Todos somos esclavos de los caprichos del tiempo!
Ven aqu, criatura de la creacin! Si muero, quiero hacerlo libre de mis cadenas!
El rechinar de la cadenas y el temblor de la tierra anuncian la llegada de este coloso. Busca hacer lo nico que sabe, servir a un maestro...
Una familia de una tierra lejana viene a saldar una deuda olvidada con una oferta del todo peculiar...
NADIE ES MS FUERTE QUE YO!
Me veis como un esclavo, y como tal me encadenis...
Tu sufrimiento me har ms fuerte.
Pronto soportars el dolor que yo cargo.
No te preocupes, lo que hago no te matar.
Ningn sufrimiento es demasiado para m. Resistir.
No teneis control sobre m. Har lo que quiera.

Nacido entre la servidumbre y obligado a luchar para placer de su amo, el Esclavo es un monstruo que camina entre hombres. Aquellos que ataquen a esta bestia impenetrable sern reducidos a una masa incoherente en cuanto el Esclavo realice su brutal contraataque como respuesta al desafo. Sin embargo, si siente que su vida est en peligro explotar en una ira incontrolable. No cumplir rdenes y slo se centrar en destruir, poco importa si el objetivo es aliado o enemigo.

El Esclavo usa las armas con las que est familiarizado: sus puos-caestos gemelos. En su estilo brutal, aplasta y mutila a aquellos desafortunados que se cruzan en su camino. La nica armadura que porta es su yelmo, aunque tambin se sirve de su hombrera. El resto de su desnudo cuerpo sirve como trofeo para lucir las incontables cicatrices infligidas por sus oponentes y, por supuesto, por su antiguo amo.

El tiempo que el Esclavo no pasaba en batalla, lo haca aislado. Como resultado inherente, slo sabe cuidar de s mismo. Har cosas en su propio beneficio que podran ser perjudiciales para el resto del equipo. Siendo sus actos demasiado egostas, el equipo siempre podr encadenarlo en los alrededores del campamento, donde no debera causar dao alguno...
MY BODY BECOMES INCORPOREAL, BUT MY RAGE REMAINS!
DESPITE MY INTANGIBLE STATE, I WILL DESTROY YOU!
MY SENSES RETURN AND WITH IT, MY RAGE!
I RETURN TO SIGHT, EAGER TO KILL!
ELDRITCH BLOOD COURSES THROUGH MY VEINS!
THE RUSH OF COMBAT. IT DRIVES ME TO ACTS OF TRAGEDY!
ONCE MORE, I LOSE MYSELF TO ANGER!
My anger is sated, for a time.
I see clearly, but not for long.
I AM A GOD AMONGST MEN. NONE CAN FACE ME!
THESE SCARS I BEAR, FAILED ATTEMPTS TO END MY LIFE!
I HAVE BEEN CURSED, MY RESILIENCE FADES!
NO! I FEEL PAIN ONCE MORE!
I am unseen. Perhaps a time to contemplate...
When none see me, I am calm...
They do not look my way, so I am at ease...
YOUR BLOWS DO NOT FAZE ME!
I BEAR THE SCARS OF COUNTLESS BATTLES! NOTHING CAN FELL ME!
I HAVE SURVIVED COUNTLESS FATAL BLOWS, ONE MORE WILL NOT FAZE ME!
OVERWHELMING RAGE MAKES ME NUMB TO PAIN!
BLOOD IN YOUR EYES, YOU WILL DIE BLIND!
I SHALL PULVERIZE YOU INTO PULP!
A DUST CLOUD FOLLOWS MY PATH OF DESTRUCTION!
KNEEL, AND PERHAPS I WILL GRANT YOU A SWIFT DEATH!
MY HATRED FOR THEM MANIFESTS AS INFECTION!
MY ELDRITCH BLOOD BURNS THEM TO THE TOUCH!
I AM THE HARBINGER OF DEATH, AND MY FOES FALL BEFORE ME!
ADRENALINE PUSHES ME BEYOND MY LIMITS!
I AM AN UNKILLABLE MOUNTAIN OF RAGE!
I AM A MAN THAT DOES NOT DIE!
I AM A SLAVE NO LONGER!
I AM FREED OF MY MENTAL SHACKLES!
I WILL NOT BE A SACRIFICE TO THIS MEANINGLESS CAUSE!
THE BODY ENDURES, BUT THE MIND SHATTERS!!!
I WILL CARVE A PATH OF DESTRUCTION!!!
NOTHING WILL REMAIN BUT BLOOD AND GORE!!!
IN THIS SAVAGE CARNAGE, ONLY I WILL REMAIN!!!
A TASTE OF TRUE FREEDOM! I MUST HAVE MORE!!!
I WILL BREAK THESE CHAINS AND FREE MY MIND!!!
I THIRST FOR BLOOD! THE CRUSHING OF BONES!!!
EACH LIFE I TAKE FUELS MY BLOODLUST!!!
I AM AN AVATAR OF DESTRUCTION!!!
I WILL RIP YOU ALL LIMB FROM LIMB!!!
I will take what I want, when I want.
If you deny me, I will not hesitate to end you.
The dirt will be your bed, I will sleep like a king.
You will listen to me. I am the leader of this expedition now.
You dislike my rule? Too bad.
I am the master, you are the slaves.
Perhaps an example must be made out of one of you.
You have valuable possessions. They are mine now.
I will crush you if you deny my orders.
OUT OF THE WAY, LEST YOU WANT TO BE TRAMPLED!
NOTHING WILL BLOCK ME FROM MY PREY!!!
I FEAR NOTHING, FOR MY WILL IS FREE!!!
WORTHLESS CATTLE! OUT OF MY WAY!
I AM BLINDED WITH PURE RAGE!!!
THE SCENT OF BLOOD! THE SIGHT OF GORE!!!
Move faster, sheep. I grow impatient.
At last, the slave becomes the master.
That's right, move along like the sheep you are!
The havoc I will cause, the destruction I will wreak!
I will leave my mark in this hell. A path of crushed bones and splattered corpses!
SHAPES BLUR TOGETHER! NONE ARE SAFE FROM ME!
YOU STAND IN MY WAY, SO YOU TOO SHALL FEEL MY WRATH!!!
I AM A WHIRLWIND OF VIOLENCE!!!
FRIEND AND FOE, ALL WILL DIE!!!
MUTILATION FOR ALL WHO APPROACH ME!!!
THIS IS MY FIGHT, NOT YOURS!
WHILE I BREATHE, NONE WILL RETREAT!
I WILL KILL ALL WHO FLEE!
YOU WILL TRIUMPH OR YOU WILL PERISH!
Even the strongest body cannot resist such corruption!
Survival at all costs! That is the only rule of life!
We are all slaves to the sands of time!
Come then, creature of creation! If I am to die, I will die free of my shackles!
The clanking of chains and trembling of the earth signal the arrival of this behemoth. Seeking to do the one thing it knows, to serve a master...
A family from a distant land come to repay a debt long forgotten with a most peculiar offering...
You see me as a slave, and chain me up as such...
Through your suffering, I will grow stronger.
Soon, you will bear the burdens I carry.
Do not fret, what I do to you will not kill you.
No injury is too much for me. I will endure.
You have no control over me. I will do as I please.

Born a slave and forced to fight for his master's pleasure, the Thrall is a monster amongst men. Any who futily assault this impenetrable beast will soon find themselves crushed to pulp as the Thrall unleashes a brutal counter-attack as punishment for defying him. However, should the Thrall feel his life is threatened, he will enter an uncontrollable rage. He will deny orders and do as he pleases as he destroys friend and foe alike.

The Thrall uses the weapons he is most familiar with, his twin cestuses. In brutal fashion, he crushes and maims any unfortunate enough to cross his path. The only armor the Thrall wears is the helmet that also serves as his collar. The rest of his body is left bare to display the countless scars inflicted by his opponents and his master.

The Thrall has spent much of his life in isolation when not in battle. As a result, he only knows how to care for himself. He will do things for his own benefit that could be detrimental to the entire party. Should his actions be too much, the party can elect to chain him up away from the camp, where he can harm no one.
